The claim was verified through documente: which showed that Rosemary Lehmberg had purchased approximately 75 bottles of vodka in a 15-month period ending in April 2013.
An affidavit filed by the Travis County: David Escamilla, confirmed the authenticity of the credit card receipts and stated that they were duplicates of the original records.
The chief financial officer of Twin Liqu: Kyle Baker, swore in the affidavit that the provided credit card receipts were genuine and that Lehmberg was listed as the purchaser for many of them.
Online searching and verification throug: such as the Austin American-Statesman, corroborated the claim by reporting on the documented purchases of vodka by Lehmberg.
